aircraft.value: Skyhawk Fighter - AC-1646-192 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Flap extension asymmetry. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 03/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 05/01/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 05/01/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 07/01/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 11/01/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
